Package com.github.tadukoo.util.lookandfeel

Class TadukooTheme

java.lang.Object
com.github.tadukoo.util.lookandfeel.TadukooTheme
public class TadukooTheme
extends java.lang.Object
Theme class for TadukooLookAndFeel. You can use the builder via the builder() method to construct it and specify whatever customizations you want.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  TadukooTheme.TadukooThemeBuilder
    Builder for TadukooTheme.
    static class  TadukooTheme.TitlePosition
    An enum used for Title Position (for Titled Borders)

      Constructs a new TadukooTheme with the given customizations.

      buttonUI - The ButtonUI class to use
      buttonFocusPaint - The PaintUIResource to use for focus on Buttons
      buttonSelectPaint - The PaintUIResource to use for select on Buttons

      systemColorDefaults - System Color defaults
      componentDefaults - Component defaults beyond those specified in the other sections
